sentences.en: The policy will be detrimental to the peace process.
sentences.cn: 这项政策将不利于和平进程。

sentences.en: Many foods are suspected of being detrimental to health because of the chemicals and additives they contain.
sentences.cn: 许多食物因所含的化学成分和添加剂被怀疑有害健康。

sentences.en: Lime in the soil is detrimental to some plants.
sentences.cn: 土壤里的石灰对某些植物有害。
